nodes.text: The Glacial Fissure was the name applied to the region surrounding a volcanic rift on the planet Hoth whose proper name was White Maw Pass. The term "Glacial Fissure" applied to the region between the Tromper Crags, the eastern border of Highmount Ridge, and the Starship Graveyard to the west. The Crystal Wastes to the south of White Maw Pass was also considered part of the area.
The fissure was home to Geo Beasts whose brains were harvested as a delicacy and used during the Feast of Prosperity.
